body_html: For users who find this issue when searching for the error message, I've created a script for diagnosing common TensorFlow on Windows installation issues. Please download the script from https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c and run python tensorflow_self_check.py. It will print suggestions for how to fix your installation. Let me know if you are still facing problems after running the script.

body: For users who find this issue when searching for the error message, I've created a script for diagnosing common TensorFlow on Windows installation issues. Please download the script from https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c and run `python tensorflow_self_check.py`. It will print suggestions for how to fix your installation. Let me know if you are still facing problems after running the script.
